text: Owen Bell (born 15 January 1999) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a midfielder for Cumnock, having previously played for Queen of the South, Workington and East Kilbride on loan. ==Career== Prior to joining Queens in 2012, Bell played for Lochar Thistle Youths. Bell debuted for Queens in a 1–0 defeat versus Greenock Morton on 24 December 2016. On 13 January 2018, Bell scored Queens consolation goal in the 85th minute away to Inverness Caledonian Thistle in a 3–1 defeat.https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/football/42588065 On 30 April 2018, Bell extended his contract to remain with the Doonhamers until the end of the 2018-19 season.http://www.qosfc.com/news-4016 On 9 February 2019, Bell joined Lowland League club East Kilbride for the rest of the 2018-19 season.https://eastkilbridefootballclub.co.uk/news/signing-news-09-02-2019 Bell joined Workington at the start of the 2019–20 season and departed the club on 25 August 2019 to take a break from football.https://workingtonafc.com/2019/08/25/danny-confirms-departures/ In October 2019, Bell signed for Cumnock Juniors F.C., who have former Queens player Paul Burns as their manager and played his first match for the Nock in a 3–2 home win versus Rutherglen Glencairn. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Scottish Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Challenge Cup !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="5"|Queen of the South |- |2016–17 |3||0||0||0||0||0||0||0||3||0 |- |2017-18 |4||1||0||0||0||0||0||0||4||1 |- |2018-19 |9||0||3||0||5||0||2||0||19||0 |- !Total!!16!!1!!3!!0!!5!!0!!2!!0!!26!!1 |- ! colspan="2"|Career total !! 16 !! 1 !! 3 !! 0 !! 5 !! 0 !! 2 !! 0 !! 26 !! 1 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Queen of the South F.C. players Category:Scottish Professional Football League players Category:East Kilbride F.C. players
